name: Owley's Adventure
description:
Welcome! Didn't expect anyone to get here :)

Owley starts the game falling out of the treetops. He needs to find his way back but he hasn't learned how to fly yet. Help him overcome water, pitfalls and...aliens?

Controls:

🔼Enter Doors / Climb Ladders/Ropes🔽Climb Down Ladders/Ropes◀▶Walk Left/RightSpaceJump

I've been developing this game as part of learning Unity and wanting to see what the entire process of game development looks like. So the final step would be publishing it and exposing myself to critics :)

I haven't been able to test the game on MacOS or Linux, but didn't want to limit the game to Windows only. So fingers crossed Unity is very good at working identical across all platforms.

This might be the first game, but hopefully not the last as I'll be exploring other game genres as well.

Feel free to leave (constructive) criticism as I'd like to improve wherever possible.
Hope you enjoy the game at least a little :)

Thanks go out to kenney.nl and Humble Bundle for the assets.
